name: The Ivy Grows
description:
The Ivy Grows was created for the NarraScope 2020 Game Jam by cygni and @enlightningbugs.

This is a demo due to time constraints, but it will be updated to the full game in the future! This demo contains the first night (and early morning) of the game. 

Play as a college student during summer vacation who was hired to house sit and tend a garden by a friend of her parent's.

Content warnings: isolation, gaslighting, paranoia.

This game has sound and it's recommended to use it, but it's not necessary.
